snippet: The latest campaign of the Neediest Cases Fund had the extra task of helping hurricane victims, but it also performed its customary role of helping those people whose everyday lives are filled with struggles.
abstract: Latest campaign of The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund had the added task of helping victims of Hurricane Sandy, but it also performed its customary role of helping those people whose everyday lives are filled with struggles.
lead_paragraph: The latest campaign of the Neediest Cases Fund had the extra task of helping hurricane victims, but it also performed its customary role of helping those people whose everyday lives are filled with struggles.

headline.print_headline: Fund Let Voices Be Heard, and for One Boy That Was Enough
headline.seo: For Times Neediest Cases Fund, a Campaign Touched by a Storm
headline.main: Fund Let Voices Be Heard, and for One Boy That Was Enough
